model.name: TTS ACE-Step v1.5 Turbo 2B
model.description: ACE-Step 1.5 Turbo (8 steps) without the 5Hz LM stage. Uses the DiT-only path for faster/leaner runs.

prompt:

You hum the tune and I fall in time
